NewsArticle.Title: Scheduled Maintenance: Account System
NewsArticle.Content:
We will be performing some maintenance on our account system today, May 6th, from 11:30am-3pm PST. During this time you will not be able to access or register your account, add/delete characters, or purchase Kruna. The games will be unaffected and you can continue to play them as normal.
Thank you, KRU Interactive
